/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. A red car is parked on the left side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the right side of the street, a person can be seen walking, perhaps enjoying a leisurely stroll. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the entire scene. The predominant colors in the image are green from the trees, red from the car, and gray from the overcast sky. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a typical day in a city, with people going about their daily routines and cars parked along the streets.
